HRED_semantic_continuity_evaluation.measurement_scope: Adjacent sentence similarity only, not complete coherence

objective_description.explanation: Mean semantic similarity of adjacent sentences computed by sentence-transformers model
objective_description.limitation: Does not measure logical coherence, causal relationships, or complete narrative coherence
objective_description.reference: Recommend comparing with other texts rather than absolute rating
